author: cbs8
title: Lip Smacking Foodie Tours Las Vegas Debuts Another Number One Tour
text:
Lip Smacking Foodie Tours
LAS VEGAS , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Lip Smacking Foodie Tours hosts the most insightful and dynamic culinary walking tours on The Strip and now Downtown Las Vegas . With hundreds of restaurants to choose from in this city that never sleeps, we don't believe that visitors should have to roll the dice to find one that satisfies. We revolutionized a way to enjoy the best dishes at several acclaimed restaurants – all in one afternoon or evening – without the hassle of reservations or waiting in line.
Our tours include:
Stops at up to five of Vegas' most highly acclaimed restaurants. The most-buzzed about signature dishes prepared by award-winning chefs. Expedited seating and service. Each stop is a different, unique dining adventure designed for the ultimate in fun and interaction. A personal guide armed with insider knowledge, insightful tips and the best photo opportunities. Downtown Lip Smacking Tour:
Get ready to take in the thrilling renaissance of downtown Las Vegas in the most extraordinary and unforgettable way. In recent years, downtown has gone uptown – in a big way. Pulsing with reinvigorated energy, it has been transformed into the city's most exciting food scene with chef-driven restaurants rich in personality and flavor.
Join us for our "Downtown Lip Smacking Tour'' to experience a side of Vegas that keeps it real with distinctive urban character. Our expert guides will provide an insider's view of downtown's past, present and future, as you take in significant landmarks, and enjoy signature dishes at the most exhilarating neighborhood restaurants devoted to farm-to-table, artisanal-crafted fare.
Our experienced guides escort you right in to the nationally acclaimed Carson Kitchen . Founded by the late-great Kerry Simon , who was known as the celebrity "rock 'n' roll'' chef, it sports an open kitchen to catch all the action up close and personal, as you enjoy Americana dishes elevated with whimsy and garden-fresh, seasonal ingredients.
At Glutton, housed inside a striking industrial-chic, mid-century building, you'll enjoy Chef-Owner Bradley Manchester's cuisine, which is all about vibrant flavors and palate-pleasing textures. Manchester has created a place with a neighborhood vibe that specializes in craft cocktails along with a concise menu of small and large plates.
At Itsy Bitsy, don't let the name fool you. At this comfortably-sized 2,500 square-foot Japanese-style tavern, Executive Chef Ricardo Romo specializes in customizable ramen and Japanese street food that melds old world artistry with new world attitude.
Amble through the unique Container Park, a must-stop, where shipping containers have been converted into swank boutiques, bustling restaurants and a spirited venue for free live music.
In between bites on tours in which all participants are age 21 or older, you'll quench your thirst at Banger Brewing. See how small-batch, craft beer is made, and sample such outrageous brews as El Heffe (Jalapeno Hefeweizen) and Morning Joe (Kolsch with French caramel & hazelnut coffee).
Lip Smacking Foodie Tours Rated as Las Vegas # 1 Food & Drink Tour on the Las Vegas Strip is now excited to debut its newest walking tour spotlighting the city's most compelling and dynamic neighborhood. "Downtown Lip Smacking Tour,'' a 2 ½-hour exploration of downtown's finest new establishments. Tour to debut on October 1, 2015 . Contact us for details or request information on any of our tours. For a Press Pass for the October 1 st , call by Monday, September 28, 2015 .
E-mail : info@VegasFoodieTour.com or call us 888-681-4388
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lip-smacking-foodie-tours-las-vegas-debuts-another-number-one-tour-300147632.html
